nodes.text: The Douz outpost was a settlement established on the desert world Tatooine, in the Arkanis sector of the Outer Rim Territories. It consisted of a few bleached dome-roofed buildings often found in cities across Tatooine. By 3 BBY, the outpost had its own power station, where landspeeders could be supplied with energy, and was equipped with a few moisture vaporators.
